title: Champion Mastery and Chromas
body: My friend and I thought that it would be nice to earn skins in champion mastery, (and probably a large chunk of the community thinks so as well), so we thought it would be cool that if we mastered a champion to level 5/max rank that we could get a choice of one of the three chromas (if the certain champion has them of course) to have for free and pay for the rest with RP but still also have the choice to buy all three at once if we are lazy. Does anyone else like this idea? Feedback appreciated.

replies.body: they should make a special skin that you get for champion mastery, that you can only get with champion mastery

Those "skins" will be chromas. Because Riot ain't making unique models for over 100 champions.

muh business

Yeah, I wanted Ebola too because everyone in Africa was getting it, but then I realized it sucked complete ass.

Same with chromas.

I think you should get all 3 chromas for the default skin of a champ after you master them, but you still have to pay for the packs for other skins. I also think paying with IP or making them cheaper would be better than 590 for 3 small colour changes on only 1 skin.
